text: Simon Bonwick (born December 1969) is a British Michelin chef. The Bonwick family own The Crown, Burchetts Green, which currently holds one Michelin Star Bonwick runs his kitchen at the Crown alone.http://www.morningadvertiser.co.uk/Pub-Food/News/Michelin-Guide-editor- praises-new-generation-of-UK-pub-chefs ==References== Category:British chefs Category:Living people Category:1969 births
title: Simon Bonwick
